TopicTitle: Terribly slow loading of main menu after 0.9 patch

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: lastest, both versions

What Happens: Always

Mods / Add-Ons: All Stock

Steps to Replicate:

Turn the game on.

Result: My KSP started to load main game menu terribly slow (this loading with treating kessler, adding K to every word and so on). It was fine before the 0.9 update (I suppose). The first loading on my core i7 2630qm with nvidia gt550m and 8GB RAM takes 4 times more than loading on my one year old netbook for 300$ with 2x2ghz CPU, 4GB RAM and intel hd graphics.

Fixes/Workarounds:

Have not found any yet.

This is nearly always due to unused network devices (often virtual ones, like Hamachi). These devices cause a problem within in Unity. Try disabling any unused devices and starting up KSP again.

Cheers,

~Claw

Could connectify or netlimiter3 cause the problem? I got no other network programs. In addition I've been using KSP with hamachi july 2014 and everything was fine. It's very strange. The logest loading time take files like flags which are small images... Some files are loading still quite fast tho.

Edited February 7, 2015 by dubler
